This year, we're highlighting three major campaigns: Youth Week Campaign, GivingTuesday, and International Women's Week.\n","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"43697b80-c489-437d-9627-39bf70edf2c1","type":"heading","props":{"textColor":"default","backgroundColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Youth Week Campaign","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"eeb10d4d-202b-4af8-8fc9-293c2efe8666","type":"paragraph","props":{"textColor":"default","backgroundColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]},{"id":"8f11b15b-a000-46b8-be75-4ecb0d38b95e","type":"paragraph","props":{"textColor":"default","backgroundColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The Youth Week Campaign focuses on empowering the next generation by supporting projects that provide education, skills development, and opportunities for young people around the world. Join us in nurturing the leaders of tomorrow by contributing to projects that uplift and inspire our youth.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7912242b-924d-4183-b2ae-a198b84c88c4","type":"paragraph","props":{"textColor":"default","backgroundColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"[Youth Week Campaign Image]","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"10b363e9-e33a-4001-a3a6-b1f09f5e63b0","type":"paragraph","props":{"textColor":"default","backgroundColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]},{"id":"8a485da5-a989-41a6-95d2-7fa92fc55a19","type":"heading","props":{"textColor":"default","backgroundColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"GivingTuesday","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"022247f7-7065-4275-8034-4b96339c6247","type":"paragraph","props":{"textColor":"default","backgroundColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]},{"id":"fd007d71-2441-49e9-8c39-a2c2a7f3fabc","type":"paragraph","props":{"textColor":"default","backgroundColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"As a founding partner of ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"GivingTuesday","styles":{"italic":true}},{"type":"text","text":", we celebrate this global day of giving by connecting donors, companies, and nonprofits to champion various causes. On this special day, your donations will have an even greater impact, as we offer matching funds and bonus prizes to help motivate donors and maximize the support for participating organizations.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e9f54451-0a13-4ad9-a54d-365493770347","type":"paragraph","props":{"textColor":"default","backgroundColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"[GivingTuesday Image]","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1cacc9b5-0368-45b0-bf48-0053b03f462b","type":"paragraph","props":{"textColor":"default","backgroundColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]},{"id":"ce726686-4a2e-4daa-a348-167ec2753b0c","type":"heading","props":{"textColor":"default","backgroundColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"International Women's Week","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8ad256e9-cb6e-453c-8ba2-78eb78ae26d5","type":"paragraph","props":{"textColor":"default","backgroundColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]},{"id":"5d414528-74d2-4d73-b430-555ebbed625c","type":"paragraph","props":{"textColor":"default","backgroundColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"In honor of International Women's Day, our International Women's Week Campaign is a five-day crowdfunding event that supports projects working to advance gender equality and uplift women and girls in communities worldwide. Stand with us in promoting gender equality and empowering women and girls by contributing to these life-changing projects.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b28a4ba6-bdf8-45cf-987d-4c3c4dacb3e2","type":"paragraph","props":{"textColor":"default","backgroundColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"[ International Women's Week Image ]","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"47e5351e-73ac-44d6-8a91-b6cc52eb48fc","type":"paragraph","props":{"textColor":"default","backgroundColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]},{"id":"1f587b24-76a6-4303-8ce0-ec1ce9728940","type":"heading","props":{"textColor":"default","backgroundColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Join us","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"159eafdb-114c-4619-a6cf-d5f2edf5495f","type":"paragraph","props":{"textColor":"default","backgroundColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"during Global Giving Week as we unite to make a difference in the lives of people around the world. Explore the campaigns, discover inspiring projects, and become a part of the global movement for generosity and positive change.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"bd9cacde-0d34-4b5d-b2b4-0c4e9affdd5e","type":"paragraph","props":{"textColor":"default","backgroundColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Get Involved:","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"21a7279d-3268-4791-8019-ebae278bba12","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"textColor":"default","backgroundColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Browse and donate to projects that resonate with you","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d6326b16-96ff-4ccd-88f6-62009459582f","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"textColor":"default","backgroundColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Share your favorite campaigns and projects on social media","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"72962dff-eae9-40ac-950e-ce00d44a4fff","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"textColor":"default","backgroundColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Encourage friends and family to participate in Global Giving Week","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"6abd9fa9-7237-4b42-b718-937a31bdce1e","type":"paragraph","props":{"textColor":"default","backgroundColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]},{"id":"37d8a085-c765-42a3-8332-cf3deaa6db9e","type":"paragraph","props":{"textColor":"default","backgroundColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Visit this link to know more about the Activates - ","styles":{}},{"type":"link","href":"https://ggw-csr-olive.vercel.app/activities","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Link","styles":{"bold":true,"textColor":"blue"}},{"type":"text","text":" ","styles":{}}]}],"children":[]},{"id":"28ca535b-15e5-43d4-afeb-5ec053e018cd","type":"paragraph","props":{"textColor":"default","backgroundColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]},{"id":"fe97cd3c-33b3-4311-b740-c63b7b7aabe8","type":"paragraph","props":{"textColor":"default","backgroundColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]},{"id":"7d9f81ce-93b1-4c64-9f0f-899e72527836","type":"heading","props":{"textColor":"default","backgroundColor":"default","textAlignment":"center","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Together","styles":{"bold":true,"textColor":"green","backgroundColor":"green"}},{"type":"text","text":", we can create a better world for all.","styles":{"bold":true,"backgroundColor":"green"}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a20a2037-71a4-4118-9eb8-1c75969c3e79","type":"paragraph","props":{"textColor":"default","backgroundColor":"default","textAlignment":"center"},"content":[],"children":[]}]

activites.name: Cleanathon - Lake /Beach Cleanup
activites.description:
The activity is intended to upkeep the health of the aquatic ecosystem and communities living nearby by ensuring that a litter free zone is established through a clean up exercise.


Volunteer Role

  • Volunteer is expected to collect non medical, non hazardous, non harmful dry waste littered around lake / beach premises - periphery as per the NGO guidelines using the supplied implements wearing the safety gears.
  • Through this exercise volunteers can also sensitise common public on the ill-effects if they continue to litter around the lake premise in the future.


Outcome

  • The activity will upkeep the wellbeing of the ecosystem
activites.summary: The activity is intended to upkeep the health of the aquatic ecosystem and communities living nearby by ensuring that a litter free zone is established through a clean up exercise.

activites.name: Each One Plant One
activites.description:
Be a part of the global mission to increase the green cover by planting numerous need specific and self thriving saplings in the permitted location identified by the organisation, where also the maintenance is taken care.


Volunteer Role

  • Volunteer is expected to prepare pit in multiples, sow the saplings, refill the soil by mixing it with manure in the required proportion and water the sapling.
  • One volunteer is expected to plant at least 3 saplings in the given timeframe.


Outcome

  • Increase in the green cover will cut down pollution, improve air quality, establish climate stability, strengthen to overcome soil erosion
activites.summary: Be a part of the global mission to increase the green cover by planting numerous need specific and self thriving saplings in the permitted location identified by the organisation, where also the maintenance is taken care.

activites.name: Animal Welfare
activites.description:
Make blankets using semi-stitched casing made out of fabric scraps and support to make donation to the orphanage home, adoption centre and dog shelters.


Volunteer Role

  • Volunteer can do simple stitching by hand with needle & thread to make the end product
  • Volunteer is expected to make atleast 2 blankets in the given timeframe


Outcome

  • The exercise will upkeep the moral and mental wellbeing of the beneficiaries
activites.summary: Make blankets using semi-stitched casing made out of fabric scraps and support to make donation to the orphanage home, adoption centre and dog shelters.

activites.name: School Transformation
activites.description:
Revamp the school by adding life to the unappealing classroom walls, non vibrant school corroidor, unpleasant compound walls, rusted compound gates and grills with paints and murals.


Volunteer Role

  • Volunteer is expected to apply a coat of paint on walls, iron structures, sketch mural outlines and fill colors using the supplied implements
  • - Each volunteer is expected to cover at least 50sq.ft of wall area with paint, murals and sketches using the supplied implements
activites.summary: Revamp the school by adding life to the unappealing classroom walls, non vibrant school corroidor, unpleasant compound walls, rusted compound gates and grills with paints and murals.

activites.name: Serving Food/tackling Malnutrition at Orphanages
activites.description:
Prepare Lucious sandwiches to support the NGO serving evening snack for the shelter home children


Volunteer Role

  • Volunteer is expected to prepare at least 25 sandwiches with the given ingredients.
  • Use the packaging solutions to keep the sandwiches consumption and transport friendly.


Outcome

  • The activity is to promote a sense of sharing of food among the volunteers
activites.summary: Prepare lucious sandwiches to support the NGO serving evening snack for the shelter home children

activites.name: Disabled Students - Learning Aid
activites.description:
Volunteer to create learning aids for children with Autism.


Volunteer Role

  • Volunteers is expected to give a shape and form to the idea and concept that can be touched and felt to improve the motor skills and learning ability of the children with Autism.


Outcome

  • The exercise will enhance the learning experience of the children.
activites.summary: Volunteer to create learning aids for children with Autism.

activites.name: Computer literacy - Session on MS office
activites.description:
Get the beneficiary acquainted with different tools available in MS Office application by sharing the importance of each tool and relating it with real life examples to make the learning interesting and useful.


Volunteer Role

  • Volunteer is expected to cover the basic function and working of each tool
  • Take session with examples and provide exercise to assess the learning outcome.


Outcome

  • The session will help to manage and represent the data effectively.
activites.summary: Get the beneficiary acquainted with different tools available in MS Office application by sharing the importance of each tool and relating it with real life examples to make the learning interesting and useful.
